profile.description: Aspiring computer scientist with a passion for developing efficient, user-centric software solutions. Proven track record in programming competitions, web development, and data visualization. Proficient in a wide array of technologies with a strong foundation in computer science fundamentals.

subsections.name: Gulf University of Science & Technology
information: Coursework: Data Structures, Concepts of Programming Languages, DBMS, Computer Architecture, Operating Systems, Networks, Data Science, Discrete Math, Numerical Analysis, Intro to Differential Equations, Applied Statistics, Linear Algebra

subsections.name: Junior Web Developer
subsections.@: Gulf University for Science and Technology (GUST) – Kuwait
information: Developed a kanban task management system with role-based user functionalities, serving 50+ active users.
Worked extensively with nuxt.js for front-end development and node.js (typescript) for backend services.
Designed mysql database tables to support application features and improve query performance.
Collaborated with a team to integrate nuxt.js with a scalable node.js (typescript) back-end.

subsections.name: Data Visualisation Engineer
information: Leveraged Plotly Express and SQLAlchemy to create visually engaging and responsive graphs, representing live Twitter data in real time.

subsections.name: 1st Place, ICPC-KCPC – Kuwait Competitive Programming Competition
Chess
information: Developed a CLI-based chess game with rule enforcement and interactive gameplay.
Utilized test-driven development with RSpec for high code quality.

subsections.name: The Odin Project (Ruby Path)
information: In-depth coverage of Ruby, RSpec, Rails, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Git.

subsections.name: Build Your Own Lisp
information: Created a Lisp-like language parser and evaluator in C, including an interactive shell with history tracking.

subsections.name: Programming Languages
subsections.@: Ruby, Python, C, C++, JavaScript, Java, SQL, Rust

subsections.name: Frameworks & Tools
subsections.@: Nuxt.js, Node.js, Rails, Git, Vim, SQLAlchemy, Plotly
